trans-unit.source: Manages the user interface (UI) for a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Hanterar användargränssnittet (UI) för en panel med smarta etiketter.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen kan inte ärvas.

trans-unit.source: You can control the display of your designer's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> with the DesignerActionUIService class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan styra visningen av dina designer <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>med DesignerActionUIService klassen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: DesignerActionUIService provides a straightforward interface for displaying the items for each component, including the following methods and events: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods display and hide the items for a component.
trans-unit.target: DesignerActionUIService erbjuder ett enkelt gränssnitt för att visa objekten för varje komponent, inklusive följande metoder och händelser: – <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>och <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>metoder visa och dölja element för en komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event indicates when the UI changes for a component.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>Händelsen anger när Användargränssnittet ändras för en komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> to manage the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> collections associated with your component.
trans-unit.target: Använd den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>att hantera den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>samlingar som är associerade med komponenten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a request is made to show or hide a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en begäran görs för att visa eller dölja en panel med smarta etiketter.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the set of specialized classes associated with the DesignerActionUIStateChange event.
trans-unit.target: I följande tabell visas uppsättningen av särskilda klasser som är associerade med DesignerActionUIStateChange-händelsen.

trans-unit.source: |Specialized type|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>|Adds information specific to smart tag panel management.
trans-unit.target: | Specialiserad typ | Beskrivning | |----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>| Lägger till information om smarta etiketter panelen management.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This class is specialized from <xref:System.EventArgs>.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler>|Connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> with its handler.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>|Denotes whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.| For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen är specialanpassat från <xref:System.EventArgs>. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler>| Ansluter <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>med dess hanterare. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>| Anger om panelen smarta etiketter som visas eller döljs. | Mer information om hur du hanterar händelser finns [NIB: förbrukar händelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler> </xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Frigör alla resurser som används av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.
trans-unit.target: Anropa Dispose när du är klar med hjälp av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Dispose lämnar den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>oanvändbar.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: När du anropar Dispose, måste du släppa alla referenser till den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>så skräpinsamlingen kan frigöra minne som den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>var upptar.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Rensa ohanterade resurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [implementera en metod för ta bort](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid anropet avyttra innan du släpper senaste referens till <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: De resurser som den använder frigörs annars inte förrän skräpinsamlingen anrop av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>objektets `Finalize` metod.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Hides the smart tag panel for a component.
trans-unit.target: Döljer panelen smarta etiketter för en komponent.

trans-unit.source: If the smart tag panel is currently being displayed, the HideUI method will hide it.
trans-unit.target: Om panelen smarta etiketter visas för närvarande, dölja metoden HideUI den.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, stipulating <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> as the event type.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden genererar den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>händelse föreskriver <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>som händelsetypen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HideUI and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> methods are implemented only to raise their corresponding events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I HideUI och <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>metoder tillämpas bara för att aktivera sina motsvarande händelser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: The actual functionality is found in the handlers for these events, which are part of the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: De faktiska funktionerna finns i hanterare för dessa händelser, som ingår i designläge-miljö.

trans-unit.source: The component whose smart tag panel should be hidden.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten vars panelen för smarta etiketter ska döljas.

trans-unit.source: Updates the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Uppdaterar panelen smarta etiketter.

trans-unit.source: The Refresh method updates the internal `DesignerAction`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>, as well as the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Uppdateringsmetoden uppdaterar den interna `DesignerAction` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>, samt panelen smarta etiketter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to refresh.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> att uppdatera.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to automatically show the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Anger om du vill visa panelen smarta etiketter automatiskt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to automatically show.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> ska visas automatiskt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically show the smart tag panel; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>automatiskt visar panelen smarta etiketter. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Displays the smart tag panel for a component.
trans-unit.target: Visar panelen smarta etiketter för en komponent.

trans-unit.source: If the smart tag panel is currently hidden, the ShowUI method will display the panel.
trans-unit.target: Om panelen smarta etiketter är dold, visas metoden ShowUI panelen.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, stipulating <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> as the event type.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden genererar den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>händelse föreskriver <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>som händelsetypen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> and ShowUI methods are implemented only to raise their corresponding events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > De <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>och ShowUI metoder tillämpas bara för att aktivera sina motsvarande händelser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: The actual functionality is found in the handlers for these events, which are part of the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: De faktiska funktionerna finns i hanterare för dessa händelser, som ingår i designläge-miljö.

trans-unit.source: The component whose smart tag panel should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten vars panelen för smarta etiketter ska visas.
